summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by adding a new multi-stop gradient utility class and applying it to both the loading screen container and the main app shell container. No backend files are shown as modified. However, there are additional modified meta/state files not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state file (project_state.json) to add/alter feature request entries and statuses, which was not requested as part of background styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for frontend background styling changes and explicitly notes no backend changes; it does not request changes to project tracking metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (documentation/summary content) unrelated to implementing background styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1; BuildRequest focuses on updating the global background gradient styling.
